juniPimMIB.name: juniPimMIB

revisions.description: Replaced Unisphere names with Juniper names.

juniPimMIB.contactinfo: Juniper Networks, Inc. Postal: 10 Technology Park Drive Westford, MA 01886-3146 USA Tel: +1 978 589 5800 Email: mib@Juniper.net
juniPimMIB.description: The enterprise MIB module for management of PIM routers.

JuniPimType.name: JuniPimType
JuniPimType.description: This data type is used do identify Sparse mode and Dense mode PIM protocol.

juniPimNumHelloRcvd.name: juniPimNumHelloRcvd
juniPimNumHelloRcvd.description: Total number of Hellos received by PIM on this router.

juniPimNumJoinPruneRcvd.name: juniPimNumJoinPruneRcvd
juniPimNumJoinPruneRcvd.description: Total number of JoinPrunes received by PIM on this router.

juniPimNumAssertRcvd.name: juniPimNumAssertRcvd
juniPimNumAssertRcvd.description: Total number of Asserts received by PIM on this router.

juniPimNumGraftRcvd.name: juniPimNumGraftRcvd
juniPimNumGraftRcvd.description: Total number of Grafts received by PIM on this router.

juniPimNumGraftAckRcvd.name: juniPimNumGraftAckRcvd
juniPimNumGraftAckRcvd.description: Total number of Graft Acks received by PIM on this router.

juniPimNumHelloSent.name: juniPimNumHelloSent
juniPimNumHelloSent.description: Total number of Hellos sent by PIM on this router.

juniPimNumJoinPruneSent.name: juniPimNumJoinPruneSent
juniPimNumJoinPruneSent.description: Total number of JoinPrunes sent by PIM on this router.

juniPimNumAssertSent.name: juniPimNumAssertSent
juniPimNumAssertSent.description: Total number of Asserts sent by PIM on this router.

juniPimNumGraftSent.name: juniPimNumGraftSent
juniPimNumGraftSent.description: Total number of Grafts sent by PIM on this router.

juniPimNumGraftAckSent.name: juniPimNumGraftAckSent
juniPimNumGraftAckSent.description: Total number of Graft Acks sent by PIM on this router.

juniPimInterfaceTable.name: juniPimInterfaceTable
juniPimInterfaceTable.description: The (conceptual) table listing enterprise specific information on a subset of the rows of the pimInterfaceTable defined in the standard PIM MIB.

juniPimInterfaceEntry.name: juniPimInterfaceEntry
juniPimInterfaceEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) in the juniPimInterfaceTable. There is one entry per entry in the pimInterfaceTable.

juniPimIntfNumHelloRcvd.name: juniPimIntfNumHelloRcvd
juniPimIntfNumHelloRcvd.description: Total number of Hellos received by PIM on this interface. It can only be cleared to 0 when doing set. Setting this also sets counters for other types of packets to 0.

juniPimIntfNumJoinPruneRcvd.name: juniPimIntfNumJoinPruneRcvd
juniPimIntfNumJoinPruneRcvd.description: Total number of JoinPrunes received by PIM on this interface. It can only be cleared to 0 when doing set. Setting this also sets counters for other types of packets to 0.

juniPimIntfNumAssertRcvd.name: juniPimIntfNumAssertRcvd
juniPimIntfNumAssertRcvd.description: Total number of Asserts received by PIM on this interface. It can only be cleared to 0 when doing set. Setting this also sets counters for other types of packets to 0.

juniPimIntfNumGraftRcvd.name: juniPimIntfNumGraftRcvd
juniPimIntfNumGraftRcvd.description: Total number of Grafts received by PIM on this interface. It can only be cleared to 0 when doing set. Setting this also sets counters for other types of packets to 0.

juniPimIntfNumGraftAckRcvd.name: juniPimIntfNumGraftAckRcvd
juniPimIntfNumGraftAckRcvd.description: Total number of Graft Acks received by PIM on this interface. It can only be cleared to 0 when doing set. Setting this also sets counters for other types of packets to 0.

juniPimIntfNumHelloSent.name: juniPimIntfNumHelloSent
juniPimIntfNumHelloSent.description: Total number of Hellos sent by PIM on this interface. It can only be cleared to 0 when doing set. Setting this also sets counters for other types of packets to 0.

juniPimIntfNumJoinPruneSent.name: juniPimIntfNumJoinPruneSent
juniPimIntfNumJoinPruneSent.description: Total number of JoinPrunes sent by PIM on this interface. It can only be cleared to 0 when doing set. Setting this also sets counters for other types of packets to 0.

juniPimIntfNumAssertSent.name: juniPimIntfNumAssertSent
juniPimIntfNumAssertSent.description: Total number of Asserts sent by PIM on this interface. It can only be cleared to 0 when doing set. Setting this also sets counters for other types of packets to 0.

juniPimIntfNumGraftSent.name: juniPimIntfNumGraftSent
juniPimIntfNumGraftSent.description: Total number of Grafts sent by PIM on this interface. It can only be cleared to 0 when doing set. Setting this also sets counters for other types of packets to 0.

juniPimIntfNumGraftAckSent.name: juniPimIntfNumGraftAckSent
juniPimIntfNumGraftAckSent.description: Total number of Graft Acks sent by PIM on this interface. It can only be cleared to 0 when doing set. Setting this also sets counters for other types of packets to 0.

juniPimIntfVersion.name: juniPimIntfVersion
juniPimIntfVersion.description: The version of PIM running on this interface.

juniPimIntfNumNbrs.name: juniPimIntfNumNbrs
juniPimIntfNumNbrs.description: Number of PIM neighbors detected on this interface.

juniPimMRouteTable.name: juniPimMRouteTable
juniPimMRouteTable.description: The (conceptual) table listing PIM multicast routing information describing its <*, *, RP>/ <*, G>/ <S, G> states.

juniPimMRouteEntry.name: juniPimMRouteEntry
juniPimMRouteEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) in the juniPimMRouteTable.

juniPimMRouteGroup.name: juniPimMRouteGroup
juniPimMRouteGroup.description: The group address. Specified as 224.0.0.0 for <*, *, RP> entries.

juniPimMRouteSource.name: juniPimMRouteSource
juniPimMRouteSource.description: The source address. Specified as 0.0.0.0 for <*, *, RP> and <*, G> entries.

juniPimMRouteSourceMask.name: juniPimMRouteSourceMask
juniPimMRouteSourceMask.description: The source address mask. Specified as 255.255.255.255 for <S, G> entries and 0.0.0.0 for <*, *, RP> and <*, G> entries.

juniPimMRouteRPAddress.name: juniPimMRouteRPAddress
juniPimMRouteRPAddress.description: The RP address used for <*, *, RP>. Specified as 0.0.0.0 for <S, G> and <*, G> entries.

juniPimMRouteUpstreamAssertTimer.name: juniPimMRouteUpstreamAssertTimer
juniPimMRouteUpstreamAssertTimer.description: The time remaining before the router changes its upstream neighbor back to its RPF neighbor. This timer is called the Assert timer in the PIM Sparse and Dense mode specification. A value of 0 indicates that no Assert has changed the upstream neighbor away from the RPF neighbor.

juniPimMRouteAssertMetric.name: juniPimMRouteAssertMetric
juniPimMRouteAssertMetric.description: The metric advertised by the assert winner on the upstream interface, or 0 if no such assert is in received.

juniPimMRouteAssertPref.name: juniPimMRouteAssertPref
juniPimMRouteAssertPref.description: The preference advertised by the assert winner on the upstream interface, or 0 if no such assert is in effect.

juniPimMRouteAssertRPTBit.name: juniPimMRouteAssertRPTBit
juniPimMRouteAssertRPTBit.description: The value of the RPT-bit advertised by the assert winner on the upstream interface, or false if no such assert is in effect.

juniPimMRouteBits.name: juniPimMRouteBits
juniPimMRouteBits.description: This object describes whether the entry is on shared tree (RPT) or shortest path tree (SPT).

juniPimMRouteRPAddrInUse.name: juniPimMRouteRPAddrInUse
juniPimMRouteRPAddrInUse.description: The RP Address being used for the <S, G>RPT/<*, G>/<*, *, RP> entries. Set to 0.0.0.0 for <S, G> entries on shortest path tree.

juniPimMRouteUpstreamNbr.name: juniPimMRouteUpstreamNbr
juniPimMRouteUpstreamNbr.description: The address of upstream neighbor being used for the entry. Its set to 0.0.0.0 if the router is directly attached to source on one of its interface.

juniPimMRouteIifAddr.name: juniPimMRouteIifAddr
juniPimMRouteIifAddr.description: The address of incoming interface for this entry.

juniPimMRouteIsWaitingToSwitchToSPT.name: juniPimMRouteIsWaitingToSwitchToSPT
juniPimMRouteIsWaitingToSwitchToSPT.description: This object describes whether the entry is still waiting to switch completely to shortest path tree in case of <S, G> entries. It waits to do this till it receives first packet from incoming interface towards shortest path tree.

juniPimMRouteEntryExpiryTimer.name: juniPimMRouteEntryExpiryTimer
juniPimMRouteEntryExpiryTimer.description: The time after which the entry timer expires for this entry. Set to 0 if entry timer is not active.

juniPimMRouteSenderDRAddr.name: juniPimMRouteSenderDRAddr
juniPimMRouteSenderDRAddr.description: The address of the designated router on the sender's subnet in case of <S, G> entries. The sender designated router register encapsulates data to RP. Set to 0.0.0.0 for <*, G> and <*, *, RP> entries.

juniPimMRouteRouteAddr.name: juniPimMRouteRouteAddr
juniPimMRouteRouteAddr.description: The address of the route being used to do RPF check for this entry. It is set to 0.0.0.0 (with juniPimMRouteRouteMask set to 255.255.255.255) if there is no route available.

juniPimMRouteRouteMask.name: juniPimMRouteRouteMask
juniPimMRouteRouteMask.description: The mask of the route being used to do RPF check for this entry. It is set to 255.255.255.255 (with juniPimMRouteRoute set to 0.0.0.0) if there is no route available.

juniPimMRouteGRPAddr.name: juniPimMRouteGRPAddr
juniPimMRouteGRPAddr.description: The address of the group-to-RP mapping being used to get the RP for this entry. It is set to 0.0.0.0 (with juniPimMRouteGRPMask set to 0.0.0.0) if there is no group-to-RP mapping available or if entry is <*, *, RP>.

juniPimMRouteGRPMask.name: juniPimMRouteGRPMask
juniPimMRouteGRPMask.description: The mask of the group-to-RP mapping being used to get the RP for this entry. It is set to 255.255.255.255 (with juniPimMRouteGRPAddr set to 0.0.0.0) if there is no group-to-RP mapping available or if entry is <*, *, RP>.

juniPimMRouteOtherProtoOifJoinTypeAll.name: juniPimMRouteOtherProtoOifJoinTypeAll
juniPimMRouteOtherProtoOifJoinTypeAll.description: This object indicates if some other multicast protocol is also interested in receiving data for this entry as a result of its interest in receiving all data. This will be particularly true for dense mode protocols which would want all data (<*, *>) from PIM sparse mode protocol.

juniPimMRouteOtherProtoOifJoinTypeG.name: juniPimMRouteOtherProtoOifJoinTypeG
juniPimMRouteOtherProtoOifJoinTypeG.description: This object indicates if some other multicast protocol is also interested in receiving data for this entry as a result of its interest in receiving data for a given group. This will be particularly true for IGMP which would want data for a given group (<*, G>) from PIM protocol.

juniPimMRouteOtherProtoOifJoinTypeSG.name: juniPimMRouteOtherProtoOifJoinTypeSG
juniPimMRouteOtherProtoOifJoinTypeSG.description: This object indicates if some other multicast protocol is also interested in receiving data for this entry as a result of its interest in receiving data for a given <source, group>. This will be particularly true for IGMPv3 which would want data for a given <source, group (<S, G>) from PIM sparse-mode protocol.

juniPimMRoutePimType.name: juniPimMRoutePimType
juniPimMRoutePimType.description: This object indicates if the owner of this entry is Sparse mode or Dense mode PIM. Owner is usually determined by the protocol running on the incoming interface of the entry. In case sparse-dense mode PIM is running on the incoming interface, sparse-mode is the owner if RP for the group is known, else dense mode is the owner.

juniPimMRouteNextHopTable.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopTable
juniPimMRouteNextHopTable.description: The (conceptual) table listing PIM multicast routing information describing its <*, *, RP>/ <*, G>/ <S, G> outgoing interfaces.

juniPimMRouteNextHopEntry.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopEntry
juniPimMRouteNextHopEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) in the juniPimMRouteNextHopTable.

juniPimMRouteNextHopGroupAddr.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopGroupAddr
juniPimMRouteNextHopGroupAddr.description: The group address. Specified as 224.0.0.0 for <*, *, RP> entries.

juniPimMRouteNextHopSrcAddr.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopSrcAddr
juniPimMRouteNextHopSrcAddr.description: The source address. Specified as 0.0.0.0 for <*, *, RP> and <*, G> entries.

juniPimMRouteNextHopSrcMask.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopSrcMask
juniPimMRouteNextHopSrcMask.description: The source address mask. Specified as 255.255.255.255 for <S, G> entries and 0.0.0.0 for <*, *, RP> and <*, G> entries.

juniPimMRouteNextHopRPAddr.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopRPAddr
juniPimMRouteNextHopRPAddr.description: The RP address used for <*, *, RP>. Specified as 0.0.0.0 for <S, G> and <*, G> entries.

juniPimMRouteNextHopIfId.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopIfId
juniPimMRouteNextHopIfId.description: The interface index of the outgoing interface (next hop). Specified as 0 for register outgoing interface. Register outgoing interfaces are created by DR on the source subnet to send PIM register encapsulated data (as unicast) to RP. It is also used by PIM boundary routers (PMBRs) to register data to RP.

juniPimMRouteNextHopAddress.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopAddress
juniPimMRouteNextHopAddress.description: This object takes following different values based on the type of next hop. It should be set to the address of RP in case the next hop interface is register interface i.e. juniPimMRouteNextHopIfId object is set to 0. It should be set to the address of neighbor in case the interface is an NBMA interface. In all other cases it should be set to the group address itself.

juniPimMRouteNextHopPruneReason.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopPruneReason
juniPimMRouteNextHopPruneReason.description: This object indicates why the downstream interface was pruned, whether in response to a PIM prune message or due to PIM Assert processing.

juniPimMRouteNextHopJoinTypeSSRP.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopJoinTypeSSRP
juniPimMRouteNextHopJoinTypeSSRP.description: This object indicates whether or not the interface was added as a result of receiving <*, *, RP> join in case of <*, *, RP> entry OR inherited as outgoing interface from corresponding <*, *, RP> entry in case of <*, G> entry.

juniPimMRouteNextHopJoinTypeG.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopJoinTypeG
juniPimMRouteNextHopJoinTypeG.description: This object indicates whether or not the interface was added as a result of receiving <*, G> join in case of <*, G> entry OR inherited as outgoing interface from corresponding <*, G> entry in case of <S, G> entry.

juniPimMRouteNextHopJoinTypeSG.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopJoinTypeSG
juniPimMRouteNextHopJoinTypeSG.description: This object indicates whether or not the interface was added as a result of receiving <S, G> join in case of <S, G> entry.

juniPimMRouteNextHopHasLGM.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopHasLGM
juniPimMRouteNextHopHasLGM.description: This object indicates whether or not the interface has local group membership (as indicated by IGMP) in case of <*, G> and <S, G> entries.

juniPimMRouteNextHopHasOifAW.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopHasOifAW
juniPimMRouteNextHopHasOifAW.description: This object indicates whether or not this interface is the winner of assert for corresponding <*, G>/<S, G> entry.

juniPimMRouteNextHopHasOifSendAssert.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopHasOifSendAssert
juniPimMRouteNextHopHasOifSendAssert.description: This object indicates whether or not this interface is going to send an assert at the end of assert suppression interval. Assert suppression is used to prevent a flood of assert to be generated in response to data or other asserts.

juniPimMRouteNextHopHasOifRegister.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopHasOifRegister
juniPimMRouteNextHopHasOifRegister.description: This object indicates whether or not this next hop is a register outgoing interface.

juniPimMRouteNextHopHasOifBorderBit.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopHasOifBorderBit
juniPimMRouteNextHopHasOifBorderBit.description: This object is used to describe a register outgoing interface. It indicates whether or not the border bit is set in the register packet when the packet is sent over the register interface. For all other (non-register) interfaces its set to false.

juniPimMRouteNextHopHasOifNullEncapsBit.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopHasOifNullEncapsBit
juniPimMRouteNextHopHasOifNullEncapsBit.description: This object is used to describe a register outgoing interface. It indicates whether or not the NULL encapsulation bit is set (periodically) in the register packet when the packet is sent over the register interface. For all other (non-register) interfaces its set to false.

juniPimMRouteNextHopJoinEndTimer.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopJoinEndTimer
juniPimMRouteNextHopJoinEndTimer.description: This object indicates the time (in seconds) left when the join timer expires for the outgoing interface. Join timer for an outgoing interface of <S, G> entry indicates when the <S, G> join expires, for a <*, G> entry indicates when the <*, G> join expires and for a <*, *, RP> entry indicates when the <*, *, RP> join expires. Inherited joins (like <S, G> inheriting from <*, G> AND <*, G> inheriting from <*, *, RP>) expire when the corresponding parent join expires.

juniPimMRouteNextHopAssertEndTimer.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopAssertEndTimer
juniPimMRouteNextHopAssertEndTimer.description: This object indicates the time (in seconds) left when the assert timer expires on this outgoing inteface.

juniPimMRouteNextHopNextAssertTimer.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopNextAssertTimer
juniPimMRouteNextHopNextAssertTimer.description: This object indicates the duration (in seconds) left for which sending an assert has been suppressed on this outgoing interface.

juniPimMRouteNextHopAssertSrcAddress.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopAssertSrcAddress
juniPimMRouteNextHopAssertSrcAddress.description: This object indicates the source address which will be used in the assert packet to send an assert out for the entry on this outgoing interface. For <S, G> entries it is the address of the source S itself. For <*, G> entries it is the address of the source whose data was forwarded using this <*, G> and caused the assert situation to happen.

juniPimMRouteNextHopRegisterSuppressionT.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopRegisterSuppressionTimer
juniPimMRouteNextHopRegisterSuppressionT.description: This object is used for register outgoing interfaces. It indicates the duration (in seconds) left for which sending a register packet has been suppressed on the register outgoing interface as a result of receiving register-stop from the RP.

juniPimMRouteNextHopPimType.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopPimType
juniPimMRouteNextHopPimType.description: This object indicates whether the outgoing interface was contributed by sparse-mode or dense-mode PIM.

juniPimMRouteNextHopPruneTimeLeft.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopPruneTimeLeft
juniPimMRouteNextHopPruneTimeLeft.description: This object indicates the time (in seconds) left when the prune timer expires on an outgoing inteface. Its used for pruned outgoing interfaces contributed by dense-mode PIM.

juniPimMRouteNextHopsendingIpAddress.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopsendingIpAddress
juniPimMRouteNextHopsendingIpAddress.description: This object describes the source IP address used by this interface to send PIM packets out on this outgoing interface.

juniPimRPSetTable.name: juniPimRPSetTable
juniPimRPSetTable.description: The (conceptual) table listing enterprise specific information on a subset of the rows of the pimRPSetTable defined in the standard PIM MIB.

juniPimRPSetEntry.name: juniPimRPSetEntry
juniPimRPSetEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) in the juniPimRPSetTable.

juniPimRPSetPriority.name: juniPimRPSetPriority
juniPimRPSetPriority.description: This object describes the priority of the RP for this group-to-RP mapping.

juniPimRPSetTypeInfo.name: juniPimRPSetTypeInfo
juniPimRPSetTypeInfo.description: This object describes the mechanism by which this group to RP mapping has been learnt, i.e. whether its statically configured, AutoRP learnt or BSR learnt. It also indicates whether the mapping is positive or negative. Negative mappings force the groups in that range to fall into dense-mode category if sparse-dense mode is configured or no RP if its purely sparse mode configuration.

juniPimRPSetAccessListName.name: juniPimRPSetAccessListName
juniPimRPSetAccessListName.description: This object lists the name of the access list from which this group-to-RP mapping was picked up in case of statically configured RPs.

juniPimStaticRPConfTable.name: juniPimStaticRPConfTable
juniPimStaticRPConfTable.description: The (conceptual) table listing statically configured PIM RPs.

juniPimStaticRPConfEntry.name: juniPimStaticRPConfEntry
juniPimStaticRPConfEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) in the juniPimStaticRPConfTable.

juniPimStaticRPConfComponentIndex.name: juniPimStaticRPConfComponentIndex
juniPimStaticRPConfComponentIndex.description: A number uniquely identifying the component. Each protocol instance connected to a separate domain should have a different index value.

juniPimStaticRPConfRPAddr.name: juniPimStaticRPConfRPAddr
juniPimStaticRPConfRPAddr.description: Ip address of the RP which for the group-to-RP mapping being configured.

juniPimStaticRPConfAccessListName.name: juniPimStaticRPConfAccessListName
juniPimStaticRPConfAccessListName.description: Name of the access list from which group-ranges are picked up for this group-ro-RP mapping. Every deny component in the list is added as negative group-ro-RP mapping.

juniPimStaticRPConfRowStatus.name: juniPimStaticRPConfRowStatus
juniPimStaticRPConfRowStatus.description: The status of this row, by which new entries may be created, or old entries deleted from this table.

juniPimStaticRPConfOverride.name: juniPimStaticRPConfOverride
juniPimStaticRPConfOverride.description: The object indicates whether or not this statically configured group-to-RP mapping should override the group-to-RP mapping learnt via AutoRP for the component group-ranges in the access list. By default AutoRP learnt group-to-RP mappings are preferred over statically configured ones. While setting the rowStatus to create a static RP, this field should be assigned to true if the override property is desired.

juniPimAutoRPConfTable.name: juniPimAutoRPConfTable
juniPimAutoRPConfTable.description: The (conceptual) table allowing AutoRP configuration of candidate RPs (advertisement agents).

juniPimAutoRPConfEntry.name: juniPimAutoRPConfEntry
juniPimAutoRPConfEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) in the juniPimAutoRPConfTable.

juniPimAutoRPConfComponentIndex.name: juniPimAutoRPConfComponentIndex
juniPimAutoRPConfComponentIndex.description: A number uniquely identifying the component. Each protocol instance connected to a separate domain should have a different index value.

juniPimAutoRPConfCandRPAddr.name: juniPimAutoRPConfCandRPAddr
juniPimAutoRPConfCandRPAddr.description: The IP address of the candidate RP for this advertising agent configuration.

juniPimAutoRPConfGroupAccessListName.name: juniPimAutoRPConfGroupAccessListName
juniPimAutoRPConfGroupAccessListName.description: The access list name from which group ranges are picked up for advertising agent configuration.

juniPimAutoRPConfRowStatus.name: juniPimAutoRPConfRowStatus
juniPimAutoRPConfRowStatus.description: The status of this row, by which new entries may be created, or old entries deleted from this table.

juniPimAutoRPConfTTL.name: juniPimAutoRPConfTTL
juniPimAutoRPConfTTL.description: The time-to-live value used while sending AutoRP advertisement out for this group-to-RP mappings created as a result of this configuration. This should be set along with juniPimAutoRPConfRowStatus while creating an AutoRP advertising agent to denote the TTL value to be used.

juniPimAutoRPConfAncmntIntvl.name: juniPimAutoRPConfAncmntIntvl
juniPimAutoRPConfAncmntIntvl.description: The time interval at which AutoRP advertisements are sent out for the group-to-RP mappings created as a result of this configuration. This should be set along with juniPimAutoRPConfRowStatus while creating an AutoRP advertising agent to denote the announcement interval to be used.

juniPimAutoRPConfifId.name: juniPimAutoRPConfifId
juniPimAutoRPConfifId.description: The interface index of the interface for the candidate RP if an interface with that address exists else it is set to 0.

juniPimAutoRPCandTable.name: juniPimAutoRPCandTable
juniPimAutoRPCandTable.description: The (conceptual) table listing AutoRP candidate RPS (advertising agents).

juniPimAutoRPCandEntry.name: juniPimAutoRPCandEntry
juniPimAutoRPCandEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) in the juniPimAutoRPCandTable.

juniPimAutoRPCandComponentIndex.name: juniPimAutoRPCandComponentIndex
juniPimAutoRPCandComponentIndex.description: A number uniquely identifying the component. Each protocol instance connected to a separate domain should have a different index value.

juniPimAutoRPCandRPAddr.name: juniPimAutoRPCandRPAddr
juniPimAutoRPCandRPAddr.description: The IP address of the candidate RP for this group-to-RP mapping.

juniPimAutoRPCandGroupAddr.name: juniPimAutoRPCandGroupAddr
juniPimAutoRPCandGroupAddr.description: The group address of the candidate RP for this group-to-RP mapping.

juniPimAutoRPCandGroupMask.name: juniPimAutoRPCandGroupMask
juniPimAutoRPCandGroupMask.description: The group mask of the candidate RP for this group-to-RP mapping.

juniPimAutoRPCandRowStatus.name: juniPimAutoRPCandRowStatus
juniPimAutoRPCandRowStatus.description: The current status of this row.

juniPimAutoRPCandAccessListName.name: juniPimAutoRPCandAccessListName
juniPimAutoRPCandAccessListName.description: The name of the group list using which this AutoRP group-to-RP candidate RP mapping was configured.

juniPimAutoRPCandAutoRPTTL.name: juniPimAutoRPCandAutoRPTTL
juniPimAutoRPCandAutoRPTTL.description: The time-to-live value used while sending AutoRP advertisement out for this group-to-RP mapping.

juniPimAutoRPCandAutoRPAncmntIntvl.name: juniPimAutoRPCandAutoRPAncmntIntvl
juniPimAutoRPCandAutoRPAncmntIntvl.description: The time interval at which AutoRP advertisements are sent out for this group-to-RP mapping.

juniPimAutoRPCandIfId.name: juniPimAutoRPCandIfId
juniPimAutoRPCandIfId.description: The interface index of the interface for this AutoRP group-to-RP candidate RP mapping if an interface for RP address exists else it is set to 0.

juniPimComponentTable.name: juniPimComponentTable
juniPimComponentTable.description: The (conceptual) table listing each component (domain) in PIM.

juniPimComponentEntry.name: juniPimComponentEntry
juniPimComponentEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) in the juniPimComponentTable.

juniPimComponentIndex.name: juniPimComponentIndex
juniPimComponentIndex.description: A number uniquely identifying the component. Each protocol instance connected to a separate domain should have a different index value.

juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingAgentRowSta.name: juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingAgentRowStatus
juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingAgentRowSta.description: The status of AutoRP mapping agent by which this router can be made an AutoRP mapping agent or removed from being an AutoRP mapping agent in this component.

juniPimComponentConfiguredAutoRPMappingA.name: juniPimComponentConfiguredAutoRPMappingAgentIfId
juniPimComponentConfiguredAutoRPMappingA.description: The interface index of the interface which mapping agent should use to send AutoRP mapping messages. If not specified, the interface with highest IP address in this domain is picked up for this purpose.

juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingAgentInterv.name: juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingAgentInterval
juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingAgentInterv.description: The time interval at which AutoRP mapping messages are sent out in this component. The default value is 60 seconds.

juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingTTL.name: juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingTTL
juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingTTL.description: The time-to-live value used while sending AutoRP mapping messages out in this component.

juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingAgentIntfAd.name: juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingAgentIntfAddr
juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingAgentIntfAd.description: The IP address of the interface which mapping agent is using to send AutoRP mapping messages.

juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingAgentWinner.name: juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingAgentWinnerAddr
juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingAgentWinner.description: The IP address of the winner AutoRP mapping agent. There can be multiple mapping agents configured in a given PIM domain(component). The mapping agent with highest IP address is chosen as the winner and it continues to send AutoRP mapping messages. If the router itself is the winner, then this is set to 0.0.0.0.

juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingAgentWinner.name: juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingAgentWinnerLastHeard
juniPimComponentAutoRPMappingAgentWinner.description: The time (in seconds) that has past since an AutoRP mapping message was receieved from the winner AutoRP mapping agent. If the router itself is the winner, then this is set to 0.

juniPimUnicastRouteTable.name: juniPimUnicastRouteTable
juniPimUnicastRouteTable.description: The (conceptual) table listing all the unicast routes currently in use by PIM for diong RPF checking.

juniPimUnicastRouteEntry.name: juniPimUnicastRouteEntry
juniPimUnicastRouteEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) in the juniPimUnicastRouteTable.

juniPimUnicastRouteEntryAddr.name: juniPimUnicastRouteEntryAddr
juniPimUnicastRouteEntryAddr.description: The address of route in use.

juniPimUnicastRouteEntryMask.name: juniPimUnicastRouteEntryMask
juniPimUnicastRouteEntryMask.description: The mask of route in use.

juniPimUnicastRouteEntryRpfNbr.name: juniPimUnicastRouteEntryRpfNbr
juniPimUnicastRouteEntryRpfNbr.description: The RPF neighbor (next-hop) to reach the route of this entry. It is set to 0.0.0.0 for directly connected routes.

juniPimUnicastRouteEntryIifId.name: juniPimUnicastRouteEntryIifId
juniPimUnicastRouteEntryIifId.description: The interface index (next-hop) to reach the route of this entry.

juniPimUnicastRouteEntryIifAddr.name: juniPimUnicastRouteEntryIifAddr
juniPimUnicastRouteEntryIifAddr.description: The interface address (next-hop) to reach the route of this entry.

juniPimUnicastRouteEntryPref.name: juniPimUnicastRouteEntryPref
juniPimUnicastRouteEntryPref.description: The preference of the route of this entry.

juniPimUnicastRouteEntryMetric.name: juniPimUnicastRouteEntryMetric
juniPimUnicastRouteEntryMetric.description: The metric of the route of this entry.

juniPimUnicastRouteEntryPimType.name: juniPimUnicastRouteEntryPimType
juniPimUnicastRouteEntryPimType.description: This object indicates whether the route specified in this entry is being used by sparse-mode and/or dense-mode PIM.

juniPimSPTThresholdTable.name: juniPimSPTThresholdTable
juniPimSPTThresholdTable.description: The (conceptual) table listing threshold values set for switching from shared tree to shortest path tree and vice versa for data forwarded by PIM sparse-mode.

juniPimSPTThresholdEntry.name: juniPimSPTThresholdEntry
juniPimSPTThresholdEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) in the juniPimSPTThresholdTable.

juniPimSPTThresholdAccessListName.name: juniPimSPTThresholdAccessListName
juniPimSPTThresholdAccessListName.description: The name of the access list from which group ranges are picked up for setting SPT threshold in this entry.

juniPimSPTThresholdRowStatus.name: juniPimSPTThresholdRowStatus
juniPimSPTThresholdRowStatus.description: The status of this row, by which new entries may be created, or old entries deleted from this table.

juniPimSPTThresholdKbps.name: juniPimSPTThresholdKbps
juniPimSPTThresholdKbps.description: The value of SPT threshold in kilobits per second. Default value is 0.

juniPimCompliance.name: juniPimCompliance
juniPimCompliance.description: The compliance statement for entities which implement the Juniper PIM MIB.

juniPimGeneralGroup.name: juniPimGeneralGroup
juniPimGeneralGroup.description: A collection of objects for managing general PIM capabilities in a Juniper product.

juniPimInterfaceGroup.name: juniPimInterfaceGroup
juniPimInterfaceGroup.description: A collection of objects for managing PIM interface capabilities in a Juniper product.

juniPimMRouteConfGroup.name: juniPimMRouteConfGroup
juniPimMRouteConfGroup.description: A collection of objects for managing PIM multicast route capabilities in a Juniper product.

juniPimMRouteNextHopGroup.name: juniPimMRouteNextHopGroup
juniPimMRouteNextHopGroup.description: A collection of objects for managing PIM multicast route next hop capabilities in a Juniper product.

juniPimRPSetGroup.name: juniPimRPSetGroup
juniPimRPSetGroup.description: A collection of objects for managing PIM RP-Set capabilities in a Juniper product.

juniPimStaticRPConfGroup.name: juniPimStaticRPConfGroup
juniPimStaticRPConfGroup.description: A collection of objects for managing statically configured PIM RPs capabilities in a Juniper product.

juniPimAutoRPConfGroup.name: juniPimAutoRPConfGroup
juniPimAutoRPConfGroup.description: A collection of objects for managing PIM AutoRP candidate advertisment agent RP capabilities in a Juniper product.

juniPimAutoRPCandGroup.name: juniPimAutoRPCandGroup
juniPimAutoRPCandGroup.description: A collection of objects for managing PIM AutoRP candidate advertising agent RP capabilities in a Juniper product.

juniPimComponentGroup.name: juniPimComponentGroup
juniPimComponentGroup.description: A collection of objects for managing PIM component (domain) capabilities in a Juniper product.

juniPimUnicastRouteGroup.name: juniPimUnicastRouteGroup
juniPimUnicastRouteGroup.description: A collection of objects for managing PIM unicast route capabilities in a Juniper product.

juniPimSPTThresholdGroup.name: juniPimSPTThresholdGroup
juniPimSPTThresholdGroup.description: A collection of objects for managing PIM shortest path tree threshold capabilities in a Juniper product.
